name: AdSpace
description:
Please enable Fullscreen to play. Submission for Ludum Dare 42: Running out of space Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Shoot

R/Right Click - Reload

The more ads that are on the screen, the bigger the coin multiplier. But be careful, the ads obstruct your screen space.

Don't forget to visit the in-game shop to buy upgrades and turn off 'ads'!
